data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 314 believers living in Brakna, Mauritania.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brakna, Mauritania

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Brakna, Mauritania to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary: On average, 87 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Brakna, Mauritania.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Brakna against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Brakna, Mauritania to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Fulani, Fulakunda people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Brakna to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Brakna, Mauritania need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Brakna who will make disciples who make disciples.
